Package com.rpfsoftwares.systembuilderlib.database

Contains all classes that allow Database connections.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContentValues
    This class is used to store a set of values that the ContentResolver can process.
    ForeignKey
    Helps setting foreign keys
    JContentValues
    A different implementation of the HashMap class; Based on Android's ContentValues class; Used to bind values to corresponding keys.
    JDbUtils
    Contains auxiliary methods to help you load data from database to a JTable
    JMySQLHelper
    Class to help you connect with MySQL databases.
    NonEditableModel  

Package com.rpfsoftwares.systembuilderlib.database Description

Contains all classes that allow Database connections.
